p: From Fig.Â 6 it can be seen that fermentation did not bring about direct changes to either pyrazines or pyrroles, as very few such compounds were found before roasting and the difference between PKOs from fermented and unfermented PKs was slight, with the content of 2,5-dimethyl pyrazine and 2,6-dimethyl pyrazine and 1H-pyrrole-2-carboxaldehyde being different between them.
